text: Jisas sɨhinda ambami, Kru muvɨra krunavundiŋ kuyusɨhɨrɨtɨrɨŋ arɨŋandɨ ñɨmbi tɨhuyahɨrɨmandɨyu vata andɨndu. Kamata Got naŋga kuyundavaravara tavɨyɨ naŋga kɨndɨ hiŋgɨrɨñɨ taŋguramandu. Kamata krunavundi ŋgɨmandɨyu vata Got naŋga kuyundavarambara kuyu pɨŋgɨrɨvɨŋgɨrɨrɨm pirɨtamandu. Harɨm nurɨ andɨndu maña narɨ maŋandɨmara. Narɨŋ yi kandɨ ambin, kru kandɨhaŋɨnɨŋɨndu ñɨmbi krunavundi tɨhuyahɨrɨmandɨyu. Hara Got mandɨhuyahɨrɨmandɨ.
